oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vera Covington oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Covington, Vera
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Clips from an oral history with Vera Covington, a student at Middle Tennessee from 1931 to 1951. Covington shares her memories of campus life and her experiences in the elementary education program supervised by former MTSC professor Miss Mary Hall
1. Covington's memories of Miss Mary Hall as education supervisor -- 2. Miss Mary Hall as a powerful teaching influence.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Campus life

College students; Teachers--Training of; Teaching; Teachers; Teacher educators; Hall, Mary Ella, 1895-1991; Delta Kappa Gamma Society. Xi State (Tenn.); Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
